job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Onderhouden van het MLOps platform' directly translates to 'Maintaining the MLOps platform', which is the core definition of MLOps.
'Inrichten monitoring' means 'Setting up monitoring', a crucial aspect of MLOps for tracking model performance and system health.
'Resource & cost monitoring' is a key responsibility within MLOps to ensure efficient and cost-effective deployment and operation of ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten van data pipelines voor specifieke use cases
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Opzetten van data pipelines voor specifieke use cases' translates to 'Setting up data pipelines for specific use cases', which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Meedenken met de data scientisten om een PoC om te zetten naar een productiewaardige oplossing gebruikmakend van het MLOps platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of taking a Proof of Concept (PoC) to a production-ready solution, which involves adapting and deploying models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.
'LLM Services toevoegen' means 'Adding LLM Services'. While LLMs are models, the act of integrating them as services implies software development to build around them.
Managing 'Codebase & bugs' is a fundamental aspect of traditional software development.
Improving 'Usability based on user feedback' is a software development task focused on the user experience of applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Beheren van de AWS accounts, incl. privacy & security
job_tasks.justification: Managing AWS accounts with a focus on privacy and security is part of the infrastructure and deployment aspect of software development and operations.
Applying new AWS features relates to leveraging cloud services for building and deploying applications, which is part of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Hiervoor werk je natuurlijk nauw samen met de data scientisten
Naast de samenwerking met de data scientisten zal je veel contact hebben met het ITOps team
Meedenken met de data scientisten om een PoC om te zetten naar een productiewaardige oplossing

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes maintaining an MLOps platform, working with data pipelines, and turning PoCs into production-ready solutions, which are core ML Engineer responsibilities. While LLM services are mentioned, the primary focus is on the operational and development aspects of the platform rather than deep generative model research or fine-tuning.
